summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game set in a snowy environment. The player character, equipped with a spear and wearing a cloak made of straw, is crouching and appears to be sneaking up on an enemy. The enemy, dressed in red, is highlighted with a health bar above their head, indicating they are a target. In the background, another enemy can be seen. The environment features snow-covered trees and a rocky landscape, with a large, dinosaur-like creature partially visible on the right. The user interface displays various icons on the bottom left and right corners, likely representing abilities or items, with a health and stamina bar at the bottom. The word "Will" with a count of "x8" is shown, possibly indicating a resource or ability available to the player.
